data.title: support.gale.com
data.text:
Join us for an informative webinar as we delve into the power of Gale Presents: Peterson's Test and Career Prep, available through NOVELny. Discover how this comprehensive resource can guide learners and career seekers on their path to success, offering test preparation materials, career exploration tools, and valuable resources for college and career planning. Learn how to leverage the features of Gale Presents: Peterson's Test and Career Prep to empower your users in achieving their educational and professional milestones.

Audience: All Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an engaging webinar as we explore how Gale/NOVELny resources can support elementary students throughout the school year. Learn how to effectively utilize Gale NOVELny resources to engage young learners, promote literacy, and support classroom instruction, enabling a successful and enriching learning journey for elementary students.

Audience: Elementary and Children’s Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an informative webinar as we explore how Gale resources available from NOVELny can support secondary students throughout the school year. Discover the wide range of resources available, including academic databases, reference, and multimedia content, designed to enhance learning and foster critical thinking. Learn how to effectively integrate Gale/NOVELny resources into curriculum to engage secondary students.

Audience: Secondary and YA/Teen Library Staff promote research skills, and support academic success.

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an informative webinar as we explore how NOVELny resources can empower your patrons to address legal affairs with confidence. Gale LegalForms, available through NOVELny, can help your patrons with common legal issues like wills, leases, contracts, business dealings, bankruptcy, divorce, and more. Along with legal forms, you’ll find a wealth of legal support sources designed to provide reliable information and guidance.

Audience: Public Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an informative webinar as we explore how NOVELny resources from Gale can support hospital and medical libraries. Discover the wide range of resources available, including medical journals, reference materials, multimedia content and more, designed to provide comprehensive and reliable information for healthcare professionals and patients. Learn how to effectively navigate these resources and assist users in accessing the wealth of information provided.

Audience: Medical and Hospital Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an engaging session as we explore the power of NOVELny's digital periodical resources from Gale for academic libraries. Discover how Gale’s OneFile resources can enhance research, support curriculum development, and provide valuable scholarly content. Learn how to navigate and utilize the vast collection of digital periodicals to empower your students and foster academic excellence.

Audience: Academic Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an engaging webinar as we explore how NOVELny resources, specifically Gale Health and Wellness, can support consumer health needs. Discover the wealth of reliable and up-to-date health information available through Gale Health and Wellness, including articles, videos, and reference materials. Learn how to effectively utilize these resources to empower your patrons in making informed decisions about their health, accessing reliable medical information, and promoting wellness.

Audience: Public Library Staff and Secondary School Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an engaging webinar as we explore how your NOVELny reader’s advisory resource, Gale Books and Authors, can guide readers to discover their next favorite book. Discover the vast collection of reading recommendations, and author information. This resource, designed to help readers of all ages find their perfect match, allows for readers to match their interests with recommended book.

Audience: All Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live

Join us for an informative webinar as we explore how NOVELny business resources can help libraries thrive in the business and academic community. Discover the wide range of business resources available through NOVELny, including company profiles, industry reports, market research materials, industry reports, legal support, business plans, and more, designed to support business researchers, academic scholars, entrepreneurs, small businesses, and economic development. Learn how to effectively utilize these resources to assist users in business planning, market analysis, and industry research. In this session, we’ll cover Gale Business: Insights, Gale Business: Entrepreneurship, and Gale LegalForms.

Audience: Public and Academic Library Staff

Please register to attend or receive a link to the recording; attendance certificates will be shared with those to attend live
